welcome_message: Hello! I am an AI News Bot. Ready to serve you the latest summarized news.
help_message_user: Hello! I am an AI-powered news bot. I can fetch, summarize, and post news to your channel or group. Getting Started (For Admins) Only administrators of this chat can configure me. The main command is /settings. With /settings, you can: - ‚ûï Add or remove news sources (RSS feeds or websites). - üé® Customize the appearance of news posts. - ‚è∞ Set the schedule for fetching news. - ü§ñ Change the AI model and summarization prompt. Available Commands: /start - Checks if I'm running and can initiate setup. /help - Shows this help message. /lang - Change the bot's language. /settings - Opens the main control panel for this chat. /set_target - (Advanced) Set a different channel/group as the destination for a specific news topic. /cancel - Cancels any current setup process (like adding a source). Some commands like /fetch_now are reserved for the bot owner for maintenance.
